title: High-Indication Drug Ranking Gap Analysis
key_finding: kNN collaborative filtering favors FOCUSED drugs over BROAD-SPECTRUM drugs

metformin.reason: Spread across diverse diseases; diluted signal for any specific disease

empagliflozin.reason: Focused on metabolic diseases; concentrated signal

implication: This is a design property, not a bug. kNN is good for predicting what a disease IS LIKE, but misses broadly-applicable drugs.
recommendation: Could add indication-count-based boosting but may increase false positives
